name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SellingPilot - Your AI-powered assistant for e-commerce.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SellingPilot: Your AI-Powered Assistant to Streamline and Accelerate E-Commerce Operations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟Introducing our comprehensive AI-driven extension, designed to revolutionize your e-commerce and customer engagement strategies. From optimizing sales performance to enhancing customer satisfaction, our tools empower you to stay ahead of market.


🚀AI Listing: Transform Your Product Pages

📈Sales Trending: Stay ahead of the market with real-time tracking of sales trends. Adjust your strategies on the fly to capture emerging market opportunities and maximize your ROI.
💡Demand Insights: Dive deep into user feedback to uncover positive keywords and precisely target your ideal customers. Craft compelling narratives that resonate and convert.
🛠️Intelligent Listing: Effortlessly create professional and differentiated product detail pages with our one-click content generation. Covering titles, selling points, and more, we help you stand out in a crowded market.


🎓AI Customer Service: Elevate Your Customer Experience

🔍Intent Analysis: Our AI smartly identifies the intent behind customer emails, enabling you to quickly grasp their needs and provide timely assistance.
✉️AI Reply Suggestions: Personalize your responses with precise reply suggestions tailored to each customer's unique situation. Boost satisfaction and loyalty with every interaction.
🌐Multi-language Support: Break down language barriers and communicate effortlessly with customers worldwide. Our multi-language support ensures seamless global engagement.


📚AI Customer Review Insights: Unlock the Voice of Your Customers

💬Pain Point Extraction: Analyze customer reviews to pinpoint areas for improvement. Use this insight to refine your products and exceed customer expectations.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑Customer Profiles: Build detailed profiles of your customers to inform targeted marketing campaigns. Understand their preferences and behaviors for more effective outreach.
🔍Motivation Revealing: Get a comprehensive view of your product's strengths and weaknesses. Leverage this knowledge to accurately pinpoint purchasing motivations and drive conversions.


📹TikTok Creator Assistant: Streamline Your Creator Marketing

📤Batch Messaging: Simplify your outreach process with one-click batch messaging. Save time and increase efficiency as you connect with creators at scale.
📝 Template Customization: Predefined templates make communication a breeze. Customize messages to fit your brand voice and reduce the cost of building new campaigns from scratch.
🔧Easy Management: Quickly filter and manage creators using templates. Flexibly adjust your settings to ensure seamless communication and collaboration.


📦Product Import: Simplify Your Product Management

⚡Instant Import: Say goodbye to manual data entry. Our extension instantly grabs Amazon product information, including prices, images, and descriptions, saving you valuable time.
📁 Flexible Import: Whether you need to import a single product, an entire category, or your entire store's inventory, we've got you covered. Our flexible import options cater to your unique needs.


🌐 Join the future of e-commerce and customer engagement with our AI-powered extensions. Try them today and unlock the full potential of your business!
